metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8842 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved bounds checking. This issue is fixed in macOS Catalina 10.15.2, Security Update 2019-002 Mojave, and Security Update 2019-007 High Sierra. In certain configurations, a remote attacker may be able to submit arbitrary print jobs.

criterions.comment: cups: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
